title: PVK Commentary on Jordan Peterson Biblical Series 3 on Bible Validity as Meme
description:
I meant to just cruise through JBP's Bib Series quickly but I couldn't rush through this citation of Sam Harris and Richard Dawkins pondering memes, extended phenotypes and the Bible. It took me two hours to get it out of my system. 

Jordan Peterson Biblical Series 3 https://youtu.be/R_GPAl_q2QQ 
Podcast with Sam Harris and Richard Dawkins https://www.samharris.org/podcast/item/an-evening-with-richard-dawkins-and-sam-harris-2

The Metaphysical Club https://www.amazon.com/Metaphysical-Club-Story-Ideas-America-ebook/dp/B000OI1AF2 

Sapiens https://www.amazon.com/Sapiens-Humankind-Yuval-Noah-Harari-ebook/dp/B00ICN066A/ 

Miracles by CS Lewis https://www.amazon.com/Miracles-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BY77FY 

Luhrmann "When God Talks Back" https://www.amazon.com/When-God-Talks-Back-Understanding-ebook/dp/B005IQZAQ0 

Carl Jung's Autobiography https://www.amazon.com/Memories-Dreams-Reflections-C-G-Jung-ebook/dp/B004FYZK52 

Lying Preachers https://youtu.be/ZdjBvSqPWCc 

Why JBP is like Jim and Pam https://youtu.be/6gqoeqOxfO0
